code: dir_roxy(path, markdown = TRUE, quiet = FALSE, ...)  file_roxy(path, markdown = TRUE, quiet = FALSE, ...)  obj_roxy(obj, title = NULL, description = NULL, markdown = TRUE, ...)

title:
Helper functions using {sinew} to make roxygen2 skeletons for directories,
files, and objects — create_roxy
text: markdown boolean return roxygen2 skeleton Markdown formatting, Default: FALSE ... Arguments passed makeOxygen add_default boolean add defaults values end PARAM fields, Default: TRUE add_fields character vector add additional roxygen2 fields, Default: c("details","examples","seealso","rdname","export") use_dictionary character, path_to_dictionary, Default: NULL use_labels boolean use label attribute data frame columns fill column description values. Ignored obj function vector. Default: FALSE. scope scope transformations: "simple" runs transformations substantially change resulting .Rd files, "full" runs transformations. larger packages, run "none", double-check track changes, run "simple" "full". obj function name function, data frame, vector (strings interpreted function names). title, description Optional title description values use
